txt.en: Within the ruins of Stormwall, cold-worms have begun nesting in the vacant lair of Etterfang….\n\nYour mission is to clear out the cold-worm nesting grounds at the ruins of Stormwall.
You have been tasked with clearing out the cold-worm nesting grounds at the ruins of Stormwall.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from Stormwall. They have found the ruins overrun with cold-worms and their nests! Had my scouts more time, they would have destroyed some of the nests. We must return to properly rid these beasts from this place.

'We can not allow any of the Frost-horde to claim a hold in Ered Mithrin!'
The monster commander in this mission will attempt to summon blizzards.
Your mission is to clear out the cold-worm nesting grounds at the ruins of Stormwall.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Stormwall.
'Well done! With many of the nests destroyed and cold-worms defeated, we should be able to regain a hold on Stormwall soon enough. You have done well!'
